methods.comment: Add the item to the player inventory

methods.comment: Returns true if the player has space for the items in the component

properties.name: mPickupMesh
properties.comment: The mesh that should be outlining

properties.comment: Index of instance we want to pickup

properties.name: mPickupComponent
